bahrain.title: Bahrain
bahrain.description: In this comprehensive Celebrity PR campaign in Bahrain, we showcased the destination's rich cultural heritage, modern lifestyle, and our partner brands to the world. Through collaboration with famous Turkish actors, we achieved millions of organic reach. Throughout the project, we created content highlighting local culture, accommodation, gastronomy and tourism experiences.

cards.title: Africa Tourism Forum to Take Place at Sharm El Sheikh International Congress Center on May 20-21, 2024
cards.description: Designed by GMT Fuarcılık, the creator of Antalya Tourism Fair, to create added value for the tourism sector and discover and develop new markets, the Africa Tourism Forum will take place at Sharm El Sheikh International Congress Center on May 20-21, 2024.

cards.title: Rixos Radamis Sharm El Sheikh Hosted Enrique Iglesias' Spectacular Performance!
cards.description: Rixos Egypt Hotels CEO Erkan Yıldırım said the following about the concert: "Having a world-renowned artist like Iglesias perform on our stage is an indication of how ambitious Rixos Radamis is not only in the hospitality sector but also in the global entertainment industry. This night, where we hosted 6000 people, became a historic milestone for Egyptian tourism and Sharm El Sheikh."

cards.title: Hadise Performed for 4 Thousand People in Sharm El Sheikh
cards.description: Famous artist Hadise met with her fans on the 2nd day of the holiday at Rixos Radamis hotel in Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt's popular vacation destination, during Eid al-Adha. She gave her fans who came from all over the world for the concert an unforgettable night.

cards.title: Prontotour Early Reservation Period Begins: Target 60 Thousand Tourists for 2025!
cards.description: Prontotour, the leading tour operator in tourism, launched its 2025 early reservation campaign with the motto "Come early and save!" The first period of the campaign offers a 50% discount opportunity. Travelers benefiting from early reservation can take advantage of installment payment benefits and Prontotour's P Installment options applied in international tours.

cards.title: Rixos Radamis Convention Center Opens
cards.description: Sharm El Sheikh, which has attracted intense interest from Turkish guests in recent years with its proximity to Turkey, visa-free travel advantage, and mild four-season climate, will now be not only a vacation destination but also a new meeting center for the business world thanks to the convention center opened by Rixos.

cards.title: Dr. Yücel Sarıaltın: "We Work to Create Works of Art in the Face and Neck Area"
cards.description: With the help of technology, aesthetic operations that help maintain a youthful appearance are becoming more accessible. Face and neck lifting procedures have become popular choices in recent times.

cards.title: Rixos Radamis Sharm El Sheikh to Host Michelin-Starred Chefs for 4 Months
cards.description: The gastronomy world is counting the days to come together in Egypt. Rixos Sharm El Sheikh is preparing to host chefs with Michelin stars, the world's iconic culinary guide.

cards.title: Jennifer Lopez Live in Sharm El Sheikh
cards.description: Jennifer Lopez performed at Rixos Radamis Sharm El Sheikh as part of her 2025 world tour. The concert was organized exclusively for hotel guests to celebrate Rixos' 25th anniversary.

cards.title: Turkish Actors in Egypt
cards.description: Turkish actors, fascinated by Egypt's historical, touristic and cultural structure and the Red Sea, invited everyone to experience this.

cards.title: Turkish Actors' Bahrain Landing
cards.description: Famous Turkish actors participated in a series of events lasting three days in Bahrain.

cards.title: Prontotour celebrated its 30th anniversary in Marrakech.
cards.description: Prontotour, a tour operator that sets trends in the travel industry, started its 30th anniversary celebrations in Morocco. Famous actors had the opportunity to explore Marrakech.

cards.title: Prontotour Completes First Period of Early Reservations with 70% Increase
cards.description: Prontotour, which completed the first period of early reservations with a 70% increase and started the second period, offers 50% discounts for domestic tours and 40% discounts for international tours.

cards.title: Leaders CXO 14th Meeting
cards.description: The first meeting of 2022, hosted by Leaderscxo Founding President Cenk Dağcı and Join PR founder Ali Saçlı with a limited number of participants and special invitation, featured guests including Prof. Dr. İlber Ortaylı, Prof. Dr. Uğur Batı...

cards.title: Prontotour Launches World Tour Program for Famous Actors and Influencers
cards.description: Tour operator Prontotour announced that it has prepared a year-long world tour program for famous actors and influencers from Turkey.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Enjoyed Vacation on the Red Sea
cards.description: Turkish TV series and film actors enjoyed a vacation in Hurghada, a resort city on the Red Sea coast. Baran Bölükbaşı, Pelin Uluksar, Gizem Güneş, Damlasu İkizoğlu, Ahmet Kayakesen, Oral Özer and Berna Koraltürk visited Hurghada, Egypt.

cards.title: Desert Safari in Egypt
cards.description: Turkish actors Ayça Ayşin Turan, Salih Bademci, İmer Özgün, Erkan Kolçak Köstendil, Cansu Tosun, İlayda Ildır, İpek Filiz Yazıcı and Alican Okumuş visited Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Gathered at Egypt's Most Famous Resort
cards.description: Turkey's leading successful actors participated in a four-day event in Sharm El Sheikh, located on the Sinai Peninsula, known as 'Egypt's Pearl'. They expressed their admiration for Sharm El Sheikh's historical and cultural structure, as well as the Red Sea.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Admired Jordan
cards.description: Famous TV series actors Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş and Emin Günenç were hosted in Jordan. Turkish actors, who were impressed by the country's tourism and cultural structure, expressed their satisfaction that their TV series and film projects were well-received in Jordan and that they were invited.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Landed in Montenegro
cards.description: Famous actors Ali Yağcı, Mehmet Aykaç, Gökçe Akyıldız, Dilara Aksüyek, Emin Günenç and Join PR founder Ali Saçlı attended the invitation hosted by Regent Porto Montenegro Hotel, Air Montenegro Airlines, Tivat Tourism Promotion Office and Porto Montenegro, organized by Join PR.

cards.title: Jordan Destination Promotion
cards.description: Famous TV series actors Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş and Emin Günenç were hosted in Jordan. Turkish actors, who were impressed by the country's tourism and cultural structure, expressed their satisfaction that their TV series and film projects were well-received in Jordan and that they were invited.

cards.title: Prontotour's 2024 Early Reservation Period Begins
cards.description: Travel enthusiasts have already started making vacation plans for 2024. Prontotour, one of Turkey's leading tour operator brands, offers 'Tours at flight ticket prices' for international, domestic and cruise tours.

blog.title: Blog

cards.title: Destination PR Strategies in Europe's Historic Cities
cards.description: Discover how destination PR strategies are shaped in Europe's historic cities with rich cultural heritage and how these cities increase their tourism potential.

cards.title: Brand Communication in Aesthetics and Wellness Industry
cards.description: Explore ways to build trust and increase brand value in the aesthetics and wellness industry, examining communication strategies that prioritize customer experience.

about.title: WHO ARE WE?
about.subtitle: Join PR is a next-generation communications agency that turns brand narratives into powerful, enduring experiences.
about.description:
Specializing in hospitality, aviation, national tourism boards, and lifestyle brands, we unite deep industry expertise with global perspective. Our 360° communication framework is driven by strategy, creativity, and data intelligence—empowering brands to shape perception, amplify influence, and build lasting equity.

Every collaboration is a strategic alliance. We champion the ambitions of the brands we partner with, transforming their goals into measurable impact and global recognition.

Join PR crafts communication that stands out, resonates, and endures.

gallery.title: Strategy laboratory
gallery.caption: Workshops aligning insight, narrative and experience design.

gallery.title: Creative production
gallery.caption: On-set experiences bringing together film, photography and digital craft.

gallery.title: Data and AI
gallery.caption: We develop growth-focused automations and intelligent experiences.

gallery.title: Destination field work
gallery.caption: Travel stories experienced in the field together with creators and partners.

seo.title: Join PR | Strategic Communication and Destination PR
seo.description: Join PR offers strategic communication, influencer relations, global marketing and event experience management.

hero.title: "We Create Influence That Lasts"
hero.subtitle: From brand positioning to global destination PR, we take your story to the world.
hero.description: We design stories built on insight, culture and measurable impact with destinations, lifestyle and luxury brands.

media.title: Turning Experience into Strategy!
media.description:
Discover the short video about how the Join PR ecosystem creates measurable impact for brands.

Success in tourism comes from a well-crafted story. Join PR creates communication strategies that enable brands to establish emotional connections with their target audience.

services.title: Corporate Communications
services.description: We manage all internal and external communication processes that brands build with their stakeholders as a unified strategy, and develop long-term corporate communication models that strengthen identity, elevate reputation and sustain trust.

services.title: Brand Communication
services.description: We design brand communication frameworks that define identity, amplify value, and create lasting relevance. Every narrative, touchpoint, and expression is crafted to strengthen recognition, build emotional connection, and establish a distinct position in the market.

services.title: Media Relations
services.description: We develop and manage comprehensive media relations strategies that reinforce brand visibility, strengthen positioning, and build lasting credibility across the media landscape.

services.title: Marketing Communications
services.description: We create integrated marketing communication strategies that articulate a brand's value, define its positioning, and connect its message with the right audiences.

services.title: Sponsorship Management
services.description: We develop comprehensive sponsorship communication strategies that enable brands to connect with their target audiences at the most relevant touchpoints.

services.title: Event and Project Management
services.description: We provide comprehensive event and project management solutions aligned with brands' goals, positioning, and communication strategies.

services.title: Influencer Marketing
services.description: We develop comprehensive influencer marketing strategies that enable brands to build authentic, impactful, and conversion-focused relationships with their target audiences.

services.title: Celebrity Marketing
services.description: We provide strategic marketing solutions that increase brand value through celebrity partnerships and reach wide audiences. We have a strong network of actors, musicians, athletes, and cultural figures.

digitalPr.title: Digital PR
digitalPr.description: We provide strategic digital PR solutions that enhance brands' visibility, reputation, and engagement power in the digital world. Through online media, social platforms, content production, influencer partnerships, and digital publications, we help brands build strong connections with their target audiences, creating a communication model that is talked about, shared, and impactful in the digital space.

influencer.title: Influencer and celebrity communication
influencer.description: We design creative campaigns that enable brands to speak the same language with their target audiences through selected talent networks.
items: Influencer selection, contracting & project management and Meta Partner Reporting
Barter, budgeted collaborations and earned media value (EMV), ROI analysis
Content scenario, hashtag, tagging & visibility planning

cta.title: Ready to strengthen your story?
cta.description: Let's create your PR and communication roadmap together.

seo.title: Join Creative | Film, Photography and Content Studio
seo.description: Join Creative produces digital content, commercial films, photography and brand stories.

hero.title: Creative production that creates cinematic impact.
hero.subtitle: Stories blending insight, craft and visual innovation.
hero.description: From concept to final edit, we produce content that travels across platforms and cultures.

media.title: Join Creative Showreel
media.description: Creative works produced by the Join Creative production team for destinations, airline brands and lifestyle stories.

services.title: Digital Content Production & Creative Execution
services.description: We produce all the digital-first creative assets brands need by blending strategy, aesthetics, and technology into a seamless production flow. From social-first videos to brand stories, product showcases, and short-form content, we deliver fast, modern, and platform-optimized productions that strengthen brand presence and generate measurable impact across all digital touchpoints.

services.title: Advertising & Campaign Films
services.description: We craft high-impact advertising and campaign films that translate a brand's core message into visually striking, emotionally resonant storytelling. From creative concepting and script development to full-scale production and post-production, we manage every stage end-to-end. The result is cinematic, insight-driven films that amplify brand visibility, strengthen positioning, and deliver standout communication across all platforms.

services.title: Visual Production
services.description: We elevate a brand's visual universe through meticulously crafted photography and creative imagery. From product shoots to lifestyle visuals, destination photography, and tailored concept shoots, we design and produce visuals that reflect the brand's aesthetic, purpose, and tone. Every image is created with intention—enhancing perception, strengthening storytelling, and delivering a cohesive visual identity across all communication channels.

services.title: Content Development & Strategic Planning
services.description: We design creative content frameworks tailored to a brand's audience, communication goals, and platform dynamics. From monthly content calendars to campaign-specific storytelling, social media concepts, and narrative flow, we develop strategic, insight-driven content structures that ensure consistency, relevance, and meaningful engagement across every touchpoint.

services.title: AI Visual Production
services.description: We provide next-generation, AI-driven visual creation that gives brands limitless creative possibilities. From product visuals and concept imagery to scene design and campaign assets, we generate high-quality, scalable outputs with exceptional speed and precision. By blending creativity with advanced AI technology, we help brands reduce traditional production costs, accelerate delivery timelines, and create truly distinctive visual worlds that stand out in any market.

services.title: AI Video Production
services.description: We produce high-quality, story-driven AI videos that bring brand narratives to life with remarkable speed and creativity. From character generation and scene creation to voice-over support and full-format video compositions, we deliver visually compelling, hyper-realistic outputs that rival traditional production. This next-gen approach empowers brands with faster workflows, lower production costs, and limitless possibilities for creating standout video content across all platforms.

items.title: Jennifer Lopez Up All Night 2025 Egypt

shorts.title: Shorts Videos
shorts.description: We embrace the vertical format that the digital world has adopted, producing effective vertical video content designed in the most screen-appropriate format for brands. From production to creativity, from editing to broadcasting, we offer innovative solutions that master the dynamics of the vertical world throughout all processes.

videoPortfolio.title: Video Portfolio
videoPortfolio.description: We transform brands' stories into compelling visual experiences through our wide range of creative production work, from destination promotions to hotel advertising films, from fashion and lifestyle productions to restaurant concept videos.

about.title: Join Creative – Creative Strategy, Production and Content Ecosystem
about.description:
Join Creative is the powerhouse where brand stories are built on a bold creative foundation and crafted for the pace of the digital age. By uniting strategy, aesthetics, and technology under one visionary approach, we deliver end-to-end content production that meets every modern brand's communication need. From digital content production to campaign films, visual production, and content planning, we create platform-specific, high-impact work that connects brands directly with their audiences and elevates their perceived value.

Embracing the future of creative production, Join Creative places AI at the core of its workflow—unlocking unprecedented speed, efficiency, and limitless imagination for brands. With advanced AI-driven visual and video production capabilities, we enhance every stage of the creative process, from striking visual design to narrative-driven video storytelling. This new-generation structure accelerates campaign delivery while empowering brands with original, distinctive, and scalable content worlds.

cta.title: Live your next creative production experience with Join x Creative.
cta.description: Tell us about your project, let's prepare a custom production plan for you.

seo.title: Join Social | Social Media Strategy and Community Management
seo.description: Join Social offers social strategy, content calendar, community management and optimization.

hero.title: Social Media Management and Strategy
hero.subtitle: Join Social provides strategic social media management that strengthens brands' identity in the digital world.
hero.description: We build continuous social programs that integrate content, creators, media and data insight.

strategy.title: Content Planning & Publishing Management
strategy.description: We structure the entire content flow according to the brand’s audience, platform dynamics, and communication strategy—managing every publishing step through a consistent, strategic, and well-organized calendar.

planning.title: Trend-Driven Short Video & Visual Creation
planning.description: We analyze platform trends and produce short videos and visuals tailored to the brand, creating high-engagement content that increases visibility and aligns with the pulse of social media.

community.title: Community Engagement & Moderation
community.description: We manage comments, messages, and interactions with a professional approach—strengthening the brand's digital community and ensuring an active, healthy communication environment.

reporting.title: Monthly Reporting & Content Performance Analysis
reporting.description: We deliver detailed reports on content performance, analyzing reach, engagement, and growth metrics to continuously optimize the strategy and provide measurable results for the brand.

steps.title: Analysis
steps.description: We listen to you, clearly identify your brand's needs, and lay the foundation for your roadmap.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Based on identified needs, we create your social media strategy, establish channel architecture, and prepare the measurement framework.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: We prepare a custom dashboard where you can monitor and manage all your social media channels from one place. Then we activate content and publishing processes.

steps.title: Optimization
steps.description: We operate a continuous improvement cycle with performance insights, test plans, and innovation sprints, advancing results every quarter.

about.title: Join Social
about.description: Join Social is our next-generation social media powerhouse, managing every channel end-to-end while elevating brand communication with AI-enhanced strategy. By unifying content creation, social media management, trend analysis, visual communication, and performance reporting under one intelligent ecosystem, it accelerates and professionalizes every step of the process. Without password sharing or security risks, Join Social enables brands to control all platforms through a single, secure smart panel—delivering a faster, smarter, and more impactful social media experience.

cta.title: Ready for next-generation social media management?
cta.description: Let's build your social media ecosystem, create fast transformations and gains.

media.title: Join Social Enables You to Monitor Your Brand's Entire Digital World from One Center
media.description: Join Social, which strengthens your social media strategy with artificial intelligence, automates and professionalizes the entire process from content production to trend tracking, from visual communication language to reporting. It allows you to manage all your platforms from a single smart panel without password sharing and without security vulnerabilities.
items: Post performance, trend content, competitor analysis and growth forecasts
Consistent visual and textual communication language

seo.title: Join Ads | Performance Marketing and Digital Advertising
seo.description: Join Ads offers media planning, campaign optimization and performance measurement.

hero.title: Digital Advertising Management & Performance Marketing
hero.subtitle: Integrated media strategies on Google, Meta and emerging platforms.
hero.description: We build measurable programs tailored to your acquisition, conversion and loyalty goals.

about.title: Join Ads – Digital Advertising Management and Performance Marketing
about.description: Join Ads is our next-generation performance marketing engine—built to accelerate brand growth and turn digital visibility into measurable, scalable business results. By unifying the full power of Google, Meta, YouTube, Yandex, and SEO under one strategic ecosystem, it delivers not just reach, but high-impact performance that outpaces competition. With data-driven decisioning, AI-enhanced optimization, and creative advertising models, Join Ads maximizes the value of every budget and transforms digital advertising into a true growth machine. This is where brands don’t just compete—they lead.

services.title: Google Ads Management
services.description: We build conversion-focused campaigns across the entire Google ecosystem—including Search, Display, Shopping, and YouTube—designed to deliver measurable, sustainable growth. By combining precise keyword strategies, smart audience segmentation, and continuously optimized ad structures, we generate high-ROAS results that elevate brand visibility and drive qualified traffic exactly where it's needed.

services.title: Meta Ads Management
services.description: We create high-impact campaigns across Instagram and Facebook using advanced targeting models, platform-specific creative sets, and continuous optimization. By aligning audience insights with compelling ad narratives, we maximize reach, engagement, and conversions—delivering a powerful balance of brand visibility and performance across the entire Meta ecosystem.

services.title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
services.description: We enhance organic visibility through a strategic blend of technical optimization, content refinement, and data-driven keyword planning. By strengthening website authority, improving search performance, and driving high-quality traffic, we create long-term, sustainable growth that positions the brand at the top of relevant search journeys.

services.title: Ad Optimization & Performance Management
services.description: We monitor every digital advertising channel in real time, continuously refining budgets, targeting, creatives, and audience segments to maximize results. With a fully data-driven approach, we reduce costs while increasing conversions—ensuring each campaign reaches peak performance and delivers measurable, scalable impact for the brand.

metrics.title: Three Optimization Areas That Shape Growth

items.title: Conversion Rate
items.description: By aligning the user journey with media strategy, we accelerate the conversion flow from first touch to purchase.

seo.title: Join AI Lab | Web Development and AI Solutions

hero.title: Design, code and artificial intelligence

about.title: Join AI Lab – AI-Powered Web, Mobile and Automation Solutions
about.description:
Join AI Lab is an innovative technology subsidiary that brings together artificial intelligence, modern software technologies, and automation platforms to accelerate brands' digital transformation. We offer end-to-end solutions in web development, UI/UX design, mobile application development, AI agents, chatbots, data integrations, and workflow automations.

From corporate companies to e-commerce brands, from travel agencies to the insurance sector, we design, develop, and continuously improve high-performance websites, user-friendly mobile experiences, and LLM-based automation systems across a wide spectrum.

We accelerate businesses' processes and prepare their digital operations for the future with holistic solutions such as modern technology stack, LLM/API integrations, n8n automations, data products, CRM integrations, AI-powered content management, secure infrastructure, and scalable system design.

seo.title: Join Escapes | Turkey's Most Read Travel Content Platform
seo.description: Join Escapes offers travel guides, destination stories, curated experiences and influencer travels.

hero.title: Turkey's most-read next-generation travel content platform.
hero.subtitle: Guides covering destinations, experiences and editorial journeys.
hero.description: We bring together travel enthusiasts, content creators and destinations through compelling stories and experimental collaborations.

about.title: Go Beyond The Map
about.description:
Join Escapes is a social content and discovery platform designed for those who love exploring and seek inspiration for experience-driven travel. It presents destinations from around the world through stories, recommendations, editorial features, travel insights, and creative narratives—offering a more inspiring, accessible, and experience-focused perspective.

Shaped by the creative vision of Join PR, Join Escapes is more than a travel guide; it is a comprehensive source of inspiration enriched with local and international tourism news, industry trends, and market insights. The platform also features Join PR's globally executed experience-driven destination marketing activities, developed in collaboration with renowned influencers, global content creators, TV personalities, and actors—highlighting the true potential of destinations through authentic storytelling.

Every piece of content delivers a holistic discovery experience that helps readers explore new routes, imagine unique experiences, and find inspiration for their own journeys.

items.description: Even when plane tickets are at sky-high prices, you don't have to give up on your international travel dreams...
